fiftyCard.heading: 50% Needs
fiftyCard.body: Allocate half of your income to cover basic needs such as rent, food, utilities and transportation.

thirty.heading: 30% Wants:
thirty.body: Use 30% of your income for non-essential expenses or 'wants', such as entertainment, dining out, or personal purchases.

twenty.heading: 20% Savings and Debt
twenty.body: Reserve the remaining 20% for saving or paying off debt. This includes contributions to emergency funds, savings for long-term goals, or additional debt payments.
